title: Courseware Design and Project-Based Learning for Computer-Based Social Domain Expert Competency Enhancement

context.prior_knowledge: Basic social studies theory and practical work experience
context.additional_context: Customized education for advanced professionals conducted in a smartphone-centric limited technology environment

learning_goals: Learners can independently design domain-specific courseware structures using the General Tutoring Environment (GTE) framework.
Learners can diagnose individual project progress through dynamic learner modeling and develop personalized feedback strategies.
Learners can systematically deliver social studies expertise by applying mobile-optimized content presentation methods.

resources: Access to Social Studies-Specific Professional Database
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
